description: Ledda Industrial, another spin-off of the now-disbanded Jonferson Space Dynamics Division, manufactures this fast ship to custom order. Powered by M-AM/AM-M conversion technology, this otherwise pretty unremarkable craft derives a small advantage in range from its engine system. The Orlams tactical use is very limited. It is, however, nice to look at as pilots across sectors mockingly note. It is mainly used for low-priority escort missions.
name: Orlam
